rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an attached walk-in closet and ensuite bathroom.
A comfortable guest room designed to be inviting and well-lit with indirect natural light.
A master bedroom located in the north region for positive energy flow.
A quiet study area with ample lighting and bookshelf space.
An exclusive gym equipped with exercise machines and soundproofed for privacy.
A functional bathroom space adjacent to the master bedrooms and guest room.

openings.description: Large window for natural light in the living area
